description: [TrickBot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0266) has used a VNC module to monitor the victim and collect information to pivot to valuable systems on the network (Citation: Trickbot VNC module July 2021)(Citation: Bitdefender Trickbot VNC module Whitepaper 2021)
